properties.body:
IONIAN SEA.
STRAIT OF OTRANTO.
GREECE TO ITALY.
DNC 09.
25 TO 30 METER F/V, BLUE HULL, 250 PERSONS
ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE BETWEEN
OTHONOI ISLAND (39-51N 19-24E) AND
SANTA MARIA DI LEUCA (39-48N 18-22E). VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 3906 5908 4527,
3906 5908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
3906 5908 4793, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
